name: gone
title: gone
text: As Boring Stranger I still write some songs here and there.

name: blue-skies-small
title: blue skies
text: As a solo musician I still write some songs here and there.

name: chom
title: cheeses of mexico
text: This is my band: Cheeses of Mexico. We've done a lot of gigs, but put down our guitars in 2016. We recently picked them up again, come hear us play!

name: spotify
title: مافيش فايدة
text: With the band Cheeses of Mexico we've released an EP called 'مافيش فايدة' last in 2015. Clicking on this link will send you through to Spotify to listen to it.

name: caulfield
title: Caulfield
text: One of the singles of our 'مافيش فايدة' EP. We shot the video with House in da Field productions

name: elvis
title: pull-me-tender
text:
I am the maintainer and creator of the pull-me-tender command line tool.
It helps you to keep track of open pull-requests on projects you're collaborating on.

name: nes-small
title: Talks
text: In July of 2016 I did a weird talk on programming the NES with assembly in JavaScript, you can find it here.

name: d6-small
title: D6 Character Creation
text: A little app to generate characters for the OpenD6 rpg system. It's built with React/Redux. Also to teach myself both of those properly. Another completely non-important thing I did.

name: small_utrechtjs
title: UtrechtJS
text: Together with a friend I founded and co-hosted the Utrecht JS meetup. We held meetings and always tried to get a diverse crowd of speakers.

name: han_university
title: HAN University of Applied Sciences
text: In 2016 I started as a lecturer at the HAN University of Applied Sciences to teach HBO-ICT the Dutch equivalent to a Bachelor of Software Engineering.

name: who
title: WHO COVID-19 Whatsapp Statistics
text: For the WHO I collaborated on a small segment of the Whatsapp Response by creating a microservice that would poll an ArcGIS server for statistics about new COVID-19 patients and deaths.

name: gunyama
title: Gunyama
text: As the new lead singer for the musical formation Gunyama we performed as part of a contest voor the Bevrijdingsfestival Utrecht.
